Presentation:
Web integrator developer for 10 years in CDI and freelance in Parisian companies.
I work on all types of web projects, web applications, websites, mobile applications.
I have worked several times on UI / UX design issues, project management.
I also carried out several projects using wordpress and woocommerce tools to create all types of websites for individuals or companies.

Research :

Freelance mission in front web development or integration.
Work in a team and develop skills on new front technologies such as Angular, ReactJS, Javascript ES6, VueJs for example.
I also also intervene on UI / UX design, project management, video editing or photoshop graphics and on wordpress / woocommerce tools if necessary.

Reviews.Title: REVIEWS
Reviews.1: Very satisfied with the work of Michael who developed our site with in particular a particularly complex personalization module!
Reviews.2: I fully thank Michael who was professional from start to finish during our work session. I recommend eyes closed!
Reviews.3: Michael is THE developer for all your web projects! I highly recommend it!
